subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Bulldogs led by as many as 11 points in the second half, but a 12-0 run flipped the game and led to the Musketeers surviving a physical first-round test.
snippet: The Bulldogs led by as many as 11 points in the second half, but a 12-0 run flipped the game and led to the Musketeers surviving a physical first-round test.
